comment.body: Hello @kaffie and everyone, to keep the videos seeding the best is to use webtorrent-desktop and to start it when you open your computer. I am currently working on adding a node service so you can also choose to have someone seeding it for you (or run it on a raspberry pie). But yeah sorry I am trying my best to make it works. Please if you have any issue post it on the github so I can try to fix it and if you want to contribute I can help you starting with it.
@Deadjoker: Wise words
It looks great !
Yes it is but I think we all have been there ;) Great job on Zeronet Dev Center by the way.
Do you use merge site to do it ?
@Krixano: I just realized it was for zeronet only so it might not be needed in this case. I though it was something like wikipedia.
I think it is good practice so the user doesn't have to download everything at once.
@Krixano: +1.
@Sksn: So many things to develop ðŸ˜†.
@Krixano: Ah ah. I am not sure what to write.
@Binchan: Yep I use this.
Bonjour Johnnybegood
@Johnnybegood: TrÃ¨s bien et bienvenu sur Zeronet !
Hubs would be nice too.
Wait for me, I am going to go buy some more hard drives !

Indeed it is not a big surprise... I agree with @Styromaniac, it is much about money. Lots of those people actually don't have a clue on how it works. I would argue that lots of them are not dishonest people but they have been feed with lots of lies.

People in this industry tend to think like that. It is unfortunate. I also went down this dark path... But today I am convinced it is all about simplicity more than money. Torrent has been working mostly because people want to share.
@Kaffie: Also IPFS what build first to share file and not browse content. I haven't tried IPFS since... I am not sure how they are doing this.
Yes sure. You need first to buy the domain name. You can run a namecoin node or buy one here : https://dotbit.me/
If you have more question you can contact me at lola@zeroid.bit
"Never attribute to malice that which is adequately explained by stupidity." Hanlon's razor
Bonjour 0bz!
